dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition '(ch = fgetc( in )) != EOF' without passing through its header block?

liveness: Does variable 'out' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?

dead_code: Can the statement 'if ( out == NULL ) {' be considered dead code?
